headline: Demystifying the magic of zero trust with my daughter and open source
description:
https://netfoundry.io/demystifying-the-magic-of-zero-trust-with-my-daughter-and-opensource/

I wrote this piece for the company I work for to try and explain to my daughter what I did for a living. I have found it also helps with other people :) Comments and suggestions appreciated!
headline_zh-Hans: 和女儿一起解密零信任的魔力和开放源代码
headline_zh-Hant: 和女兒一起解密零信任的魔力和開放源代碼
description_zh-Hans:
https://netfoundry.io/demystifying-the-magic-of-zero-trust-with-my-daughter-and-opensource/

我为我工作的公司写了这篇文章，试图向我女儿解释我的工作内容。我发现它对其他人也有帮助 :) 谢谢你的评论和建议。
description_zh-Hant:
https://netfoundry.io/demystifying-the-magic-of-zero-trust-with-my-daughter-and-opensource/

我為我工作的公司寫了這篇文章，試圖向我女兒解釋我的工作內容。我發現它對其他人也有幫助 :) 謝謝你的評論和建議。
